mapper.sql: PK_ASSET, PROV_CODE, VERSION, ASSET_NAME, ASSET_CODE, ASSET_IP, ASSET_DESC, ASSET_STATE, PK_ASSET_TYPE, PK_PROV_BS, COME_FROM, FOREIGN_ID, FIRST_FOUND_TIME, LAST_FOUND_TIME, FIRST_FOUND_TYPE, LAST_FOUND_TYPE, FIRST_SYNC_TIME, LAST_SYNC_TIME, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST, PK_ONLINE_USER, ONLINE_TIME, PK_OFFLINE_USER, OFFLINE_TIME, PK_DELETE_USER, DELETE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from am_asset
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into am_asset (PK_ASSET, PROV_CODE, VERSION, ASSET_NAME, ASSET_CODE, ASSET_IP, ASSET_DESC, ASSET_STATE, PK_ASSET_TYPE, PK_PROV_BS, COME_FROM, FOREIGN_ID, FIRST_FOUND_TIME, LAST_FOUND_TIME, FIRST_FOUND_TYPE, LAST_FOUND_TYPE, FIRST_SYNC_TIME, LAST_SYNC_TIME, PK_CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, PK_MENDER, MEND_TIME_LAST, PK_ONLINE_USER, ONLINE_TIME, PK_OFFLINE_USER, OFFLINE_TIME, PK_DELETE_USER, DELETE_TIME) values (#{pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pkProvBs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lastFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{firstSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkOnlineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkOfflineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pkDeleteUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update am_asset
PK_ASSET = #{record.pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROV_CODE = #{record.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_NAME = #{record.assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_CODE = #{record.assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_IP = #{record.assetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_DESC = #{record.assetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_STATE = #{record.assetState,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{record.pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_PROV_BS = #{record.pkProvBs,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FOREIGN_ID = #{record.foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_FOUND_TIME = #{record.firstFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_FOUND_TIME = #{record.lastFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIRST_FOUND_TYPE = #{record.firstFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LAST_FOUND_TYPE = #{record.lastFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIRST_SYNC_TIME = #{record.firstSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_SYNC_TIME = #{record.lastSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_ONLINE_USER = #{record.pkOnlineUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
ONLINE_TIME = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_OFFLINE_USER = #{record.pkOfflineUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
OFFLINE_TIME = #{record.offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_DELETE_USER = #{record.pkDeleteUser,jdbcType=CHAR},
DELETE_TIME = #{record.deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update am_asset set PK_ASSET = #{record.pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROV_CODE = #{record.provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_NAME = #{record.assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_CODE = #{record.assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_IP = #{record.assetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_DESC = #{record.assetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_STATE = #{record.assetState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{record.pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_PROV_BS = #{record.pkProvBs,jdbcType=CHAR}, COME_FROM = #{record.comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FOREIGN_ID = #{record.foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_FOUND_TIME = #{record.firstFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_FOUND_TIME = #{record.lastFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIRST_FOUND_TYPE = #{record.firstFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, LAST_FOUND_TYPE = #{record.lastFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIRST_SYNC_TIME = #{record.firstSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_SYNC_TIME = #{record.lastSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_CREATOR = #{record.pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{record.pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{record.mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_ONLINE_USER = #{record.pkOnlineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, ONLINE_TIME = #{record.onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_OFFLINE_USER = #{record.pkOfflineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, OFFLINE_TIME = #{record.offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_DELETE_USER = #{record.pkDeleteUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, DELETE_TIME = #{record.deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update am_asset
PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_NAME = #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_CODE = #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_IP = #{assetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_DESC = #{assetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ASSET_STATE = #{assetState,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PK_PROV_BS = #{pkProvBs,jdbcType=CHAR},
COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FOREIGN_ID = #{foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_FOUND_TIME = #{firstFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_FOUND_TIME = #{lastFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIRST_FOUND_TYPE = #{firstFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LAST_FOUND_TYPE = #{lastFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FIRST_SYNC_TIME = #{firstSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_SYNC_TIME = #{lastSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR},
MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PK_OFFLINE_USER = #{pkOfflineUser,jdbcType=CHAR},

PK_DELETE_USER = #{pkDeleteUser,jdbcType=CHAR},

where PK_ASSET = #{pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR}

update am_asset set PROV_CODE = #{provCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_NAME = #{assetName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_CODE = #{assetCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_IP = #{assetIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_DESC = #{assetDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSET_STATE = #{assetState,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PK_ASSET_TYPE = #{pkAssetType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PK_PROV_BS = #{pkProvBs,jdbcType=CHAR}, COME_FROM = #{comeFrom,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FOREIGN_ID = #{foreignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_FOUND_TIME = #{firstFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_FOUND_TIME = #{lastFoundTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIRST_FOUND_TYPE = #{firstFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, LAST_FOUND_TYPE = #{lastFoundType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FIRST_SYNC_TIME = #{firstSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_SYNC_TIME = #{lastSyncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_CREATOR = #{pkCreator,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_MENDER = #{pkMender,jdbcType=CHAR}, MEND_TIME_LAST = #{mendTimeLast,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_ONLINE_USER = #{pkOnlineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, ONLINE_TIME = #{onlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_OFFLINE_USER = #{pkOfflineUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, OFFLINE_TIME = #{offlineTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PK_DELETE_USER = #{pkDeleteUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, DELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PK_ASSET = #{pkAsset,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.`PK_ASSET`,d.`PROV_NAME` AS`PROV_CODE`,a.`ASSET_NAME`,a.`ASSET_IP`,b.`TYPE_NAME`,c.`BS_NAME` , (CASE a.`COME_FROM` WHEN 1 THEN '人工录入' WHEN 2 THEN 'Excel导入' WHEN 3 THEN '4A同步' WHEN 4 THEN '未知资产接入' END) AS COME_FROM, (CASE a.`ASSET_STATE` WHEN 1 THEN '临时' WHEN 2 THEN '有效' WHEN 3 THEN '停用' WHEN 4 THEN '删' END ) AS ASSET_STATE FROM `am_asset` a,`am_asset_type` b,`am_bs_prov` c,`bdm_prov` d WHERE a.`PK_ASSET_TYPE`=b.`PK_ASSET_TYPE` AND a.`PROV_CODE`=d.`PROV_CODE` AND a.`PK_PROV_BS`=c.`PK_BS_PROV` AND a.`ASSET_STATE` !=4

SELECT a.`PK_ASSET`,d.`PROV_NAME` AS`PROV_CODE`,a.`ASSET_NAME`,a.`ASSET_IP`,b.`TYPE_NAME`,c.`BS_NAME` , (CASE a.`COME_FROM` WHEN 1 THEN '人工录入' WHEN 2 THEN 'Excel导入' WHEN 3 THEN '4A同步' WHEN 4 THEN '未知资产接入' END) AS COME_FROM, (CASE a.`ASSET_STATE` WHEN 1 THEN '临时' WHEN 2 THEN '有效' WHEN 3 THEN '停用' WHEN 4 THEN '删' END ) AS ASSET_STATE, a.`PK_ONLINE_USER`,a.`ONLINE_TIME`,a.`ASSET_CODE` FROM `am_asset` a,`am_asset_type` b,`am_bs_prov` c,`bdm_prov` d WHERE a.`PK_ASSET_TYPE`=b.`PK_ASSET_TYPE` AND a.`PROV_CODE`=d.`PROV_CODE` AND a.`PK_PROV_BS`=c.`PK_BS_PROV` AND a.`PK_ASSET`=#{id}
